odmpy documentation
===================

odmpy is a python package for creating valid ASCII OPM, OMM, and OEM
files.

Currently, only the orbital parameter message (OPM) module has been
implemented.

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 3

   installation
   modules
   user
